DOC.brief_title: The Comparison Strategies PREPARE Severely CALCified Coronary Lesions Trial ( PREPARE-CALC )
DOC.criteria: 1 . Clinical inclusion criterion Age 18 year consentable Angiographically proven coronary artery disease Anginal symptom and/or reproducible ischemia target area ECG , functional stress test fractional flow reserve Written inform consent 2 . Angiographic inclusion criterion Denovo lesion native coronary artery Target reference vessel diameter 2.25 4.0 mm visual estimation Luminal diameter reduction 50100 % visual estimation Severe calcification target lesion 1 . Clinical exclusion criterion Myocardial infarction ( within 1 week ) Decompensated heart failure Limited long term prognosis due condition 2 . Angiographic exclusion criterion Target lesion coronary artery bypass graft Target lesion instent restenosis Target vessel thrombus
